ä¸æˆ‘å†™çš„å¦ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ç•¥æœ‰ä¸åŒï¼Œè¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦å°†æ–‡ä»¶æ¨é€åˆ° Cloudflare Workers Siteã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ Cloudflare å®˜æ–¹ wrangler-action è½»æ¾å®ç°è¿™ä¸€è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

wrangler-action çš„ä½¿ç”¨åŒæ ·éœ€è¦è®¾ç½® API Tokenã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šé¢ç”Ÿæˆçš„ API Tokenï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å†ç”³è¯·ä¸€ä¸ª API Tokenï¼Œæ¨¡æ¿å’Œæƒé™ä¸ä¸Šé¢ç›¸åŒã€‚

ç„¶åå† GitHub å­˜æ”¾ä½ åšå®¢æºç çš„ä»“åº“æ·»åŠ  Secrets å˜é‡ CF_WORKERS_TOKENï¼Œå†…å®¹ä¸ºä½ ç”³è¯·çš„ API Tokenã€‚

æˆ‘çš„ GitHub Action é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒï¼‰

name: GitHub Auto Builder For Blog

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
#  schedule:
#    - cron: '0 21 * * *'

env:
  TZ: Asia/Shanghai

jobs:
  blog-cicd:
    name: Hexo build and deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version:
          - 12.x
          
    steps:
      - name: Checkout codes
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Use Node.js ${{ matrix.node-version }}
        uses: actions/setup-node@v1
        with:
          node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}

      - name: Cache Node Dependencies
        id: cache
        uses: actions/cache@v1
        with:
          path: .npm
          key: ${{runner.OS}}-npm-caches-${{ hashFiles('package-lock.json') }}

      - name: Clone themes
        run: |
                    git clone -b dev https://github.com/jerryc127/hexo-theme-butterfly.git themes/butterfly

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          npm install hexo-cli -g
          npm install          

      - name: Generate files and gulp
        run: |
                    hexo clean && hexo generate && gulp
      
      - name: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers
        uses: cloudflare/wrangler-action@1.3.0
        with:
                apiToken: ${{ secrets.CF_WORKERS_TOKEN }}
